Translations.Text: wanjeonhan gwedoleul gajin haneullo maengsehanani
sillo neohuineun ilchihaji anhneun nonjaeng-eul ilsamneun jadeul-ila
jinsillobuteo meol-eojyeo hyeonhogdoen ja machangajilo yuheugdoenola
geojishaneun jadeul wie jeojuga iss-eulini
geudeul-eun honlan-ui hongsu sog-eseo mugwansimhaessdeon jadeullo
simpan-ui nal-i eonje oneunyo lago mul-eumae
geudeul-i buljiog-e deul-eoga tae wojineun nal-ila
i beol-eul masbola neohuiga seodul leo jaechoghaessdeon geos-ila
geuleona uiloun jadeul-eun saem-i issneun cheongug-eseo geojuhamyeo
junimkkeseo buyeohan eunhyesog-eseo gippeohanani ineun geudeul-i uilobge sal-assgi ttaemun-ila
geudeul-eun bam-edo manh-eun jam-eul ja ji anihago
ileun saebyeogbuteo
geuga gajin jaesanjung-eseo pil-yo lo han jawa yoguhaji moshan ja-ege iljeonghan mogs-eul bepuneun jala
daeji wieneun mid-eum-i hwaggohan jadeul-eul wihan yejeungdeul-i iss-eumyeo
neohui ma-eumsog-edo issgeoneul neo huineun alji moshaneunyo
haneul-eneun neohuiga il-yonghal yang sig-i iss-eumyeo ttohan neohuiege yagsog doen geosdo issnola
haneulgwa daejiui junim-eulo maeng sehasa igeos-eun neohuiga seolo-ege malhago issneun geoscheoleom jinlila
abeulaham-ui jongyeongbadneun sonnim-uiyaegiga geudaeege ileuleossneunyo
geudeul-i geuege pyeong-anhasoseo lago insahani geudo pyeong-anhasoseolago alji moshan geudeul-ege insahadeo la
geuttaeneun jaeppalli geuui jib-an-eu lo deul-eoga saljjin song-aji hanmalileul gajyeowa
geugeos-eul geudeul ap-e noh-eumyeonseo deusiji anhgessseubnikka lago malhayeossdeola

geudeul-i meogji anihaja geuneun geudeul-eul dulyeowo hayeossnola ittae geu deul-i dulyeowo haji mallago malhamyeo geuege chongmyeonghan adeul-i iss-eul geos-i laneun gippeun sosig-eul jeonhayeossdeola
ittae keuge us-eumyeo geuui anaega dagawa geunyeoui imaleul ttaelimyeo neulg-go bul-im-ui yeoseong-i aeleul gajneundan mal-iyo lago malhamae
geudeul-eun junimkkeseo geuleohge mal sseum-i iss-eoss-euni sillo geubun-eun jihye wa asim-eulo chungmanhasim-ila daedabhayeossdeola
